content.description: Examine the images shown, then answer the questions that follow.
content.question: Which of the following changes in global economic patterns occurred because of the innovations depicted in the two images?

choices.label: Most regions developed the two innovations shown in the images independently, with a rapid increase in output and worldwide distribution capabilities.
The two innovations led to the development of many new cities and expansion of the leisure travel industry for people living near major transportation hubs.
Early adopters of the two innovations began to increase colonization in search of new sources of raw materials for manufacturing goods.
Development of the two innovations significantly increased economic equality in the world as goods could be spread much more evenly between countries.
Development of the two innovations allowed most people to stop working in agriculture and train for jobs in the travel industry.

content.answer: Early adopters of the two innovations began to increase colonization in search of new sources of raw materials for manufacturing goods.
